Once in a bustling anthill, there lived an ant named Arlo, who dreamed of being a giant. Unlike his tiny comrades, he envisioned a world where he could reach the tallest blades of grass and explore beyond the confines of their home. One fateful day, a mysterious glowing mushroom sprouted nearby. Curious, Arlo approached and took a bite. Instantly, he grew to the size of a tree! At first, his newfound stature terrified the other ants, but soon they realized Arlo could help them gather food and protect the colony. Together, they thrived, proving that size doesn't define one's heart.
